WorkItem.Description: The code indentation stops working when I have a 'debugger;' statement somewhere in my .ts file.
WorkItem.Summary: Code formatting fails when code contains 'debugger;' statement

Comments.Message: Thanks for reporting this issue! Marking it as 'Active' (to be fixed).

Great Ryan! 
I'm not sure if it is already known, but code indentation also fails for lines with only variable declarations, like:

    var x, y;

Grtz,

Maarten Docter
This should be fixed in our new release, 0.8.2.0. Please give it a try and reactive if you're still seeing this problem. Thanks again for reporting it.
